118  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& v1) {
119 
120  if (v1.GetSize() != mWindow.size()) {
121  Resize(v1.GetSize());
122  LogWarning("KaiserWindow: Resizing window");
123  }

140  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& v1, SeqViewDouble& v2) {
141 
142  Dmatrix *arg1 = v1.GetData();
143  Dmatrix *arg2 = v2.GetData();
144 
145  if (v1.GetSize() != mWindow.size()) {
146  Resize(v1.GetSize());
147  LogWarning("KaiserWindow: Resizing window");
148  }
149 
150  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
151  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
152  LogWarning("KaiserWindow: Resizing output");
153  }
154 
155  execute(*arg1, *arg2);
156 
157  v2.SetScale(v1.GetScale());
158  v2.SetStart(v1.GetStart());
159  v2.SetSampling(v1.GetSampling());
160 
161 
162  };
163 
169  void Resize(unsigned int size) {
170  BaseWindow::Resize(size);
171  FillWindow();
172  }

209  double mAlpha;
210 
217  void FillWindow() {
218  unsigned int n = mWindow.size() - 1;
219 
220  double norm = 1.0 / gsl_sf_bessel_I0(M_PI * mAlpha);
221 
222  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < n; k++) {
223 
224  double p = double(2.0 * k) / n - 1.0;
225  double x = M_PI * mAlpha * sqrt(1.0 - p * p);
226 
227  mWindow(k) = norm * gsl_sf_bessel_I0(x);
228 
229  }
230 
231  Normalize();
232  };
233 
234 
235  };
